summary: This module provides a suite of decorator factories that transform regular Python callables into Click command-line components such as commands, groups, arguments, options, and callbacks. It also includes utilities for parameter handling, context/object passing, and common option shortcuts (e.g., confirmation, password, version).
business_intent: To simplify the definition of command-line interfaces by allowing developers to annotate functions with expressive decorators that automatically generate Click command objects and associated options, thereby streamlining CLI development.
